page.title: 18MUSICAL EVENING
page.content: EACH YEAR OUR SCHOOL HAS A MUSICAL EVENING AND INVITES THE CHILDREN'S FAMILIES TO COME AND LISTEN AND ALSO TAKE PART.THIS YEAR GROUPS OF MUSICIANS FROM EACH CLASS PLAYED OR SANG FOR THE AUDIENCE. WE HAD THREE{RECORDER GROUPS}PLAYING SOME SIMPLE,AND SOME DIFFICULT PIECES. OUR{SCHOOL BRASS BAND}PLAYED AND WE ALSO HAD A GROUP OF SINGERS WHO WERE ACCOMPANIED BY THE RECORDER PLAYERS AND MR.CHORLTON PLAYING HIS GUITAR. TWO GIRLS PLAYED A PIANO DUET AND ANOTHER A SOLO ITEM. THERE WERE SONGS FOR THE AUDIENCE TO JOIN IN AS WELL.THE DADS DIDN'T SING VERY WELL WHEN IT WAS THEIR TURN! AT THE INTERVAL THE PARENTS WERE SERVRD STRAWBERRIES AND A GLASS OF WINE AND THE CHILDREN HAD ORANGE JUICE.
